q1.question: How does Services-helper work?
q1.answer: Post an order or an offer, wait for responses from specialists and choose a performer from those who responded or from top specialists in the category. After the order is completed, leave a review — it helps the community grow and find reliable partners.

q2.question: Do I have to pay to use the site?
q2.answer: For clients — the platform is free to use. For specialists — there are free features and paid subscriptions with advanced promotion tools.

q3.question: What’s included in a Premium account?
q3.answer: Premium helps specialists stand out and get more orders. It includes: priority placement in search; ‘Sponsored’ label; ability to add links to website and social media; twice as many portfolio photos; participation in Services-helper campaigns.

q4.question: How do payments happen between client and specialist?
q4.answer: The platform doesn’t process payments — parties settle directly. Services-helper charges no commission and isn’t responsible for the payment.

q5.question: How can I improve my rating?
q5.answer: Complete orders, get good reviews, and keep your profile up to date. The higher your activity and rating, the more orders you receive.

q6.question: Is Services-helper safe to use?
q6.answer: Yes. We moderate content, process reports, and protect user data. All reviews are published openly to maintain transparency and trust.

q7.question: What if I have an issue or complaint?
q7.answer: Use the ‘Report’ button on any profile page or email legal@services-helper.com — we review submissions within 15 working days.

q8.question: Can I delete my profile?
q8.answer: Yes. After deletion, some technical data (e.g., ID and transaction history) may be stored for up to 6 months by law, then automatically deleted.

q9.question: What is the referral program?
q9.answer: Invite other specialists via your personal link and get a discount on a subscription. Terms and discount size may change to keep the program flexible.

q10.question: How can I add links or showcase my work?
q10.answer: Premium users can add active links to their websites and social profiles and upload more photos of completed projects, subject to site rules and content moderation policies.
